title: System Information Commands
content: System Information Commands systeminfo msinfo32 dxdiag winver dir Provides a detailed summary of the computer's hardware and software configuration. Opens the System Information graphical utility. Launches the DirectX DiagNOSstic Tool, used to troubleshoot video and sound card problems. Displays the About Windows dialog box. Lists files and directories. *.cpl. how to check pc specs, my computer information, مواصفات جهازي, معرفة نسخة الويندوز

title: File & Directory Commands
content: File & Directory Commands File & Directory Management mkdir md echo attrib Displays or changes file attributes. You can manage Read-only (R), Archive (A), System (S), and Hidden (H) attributes. /s /d. Make Directory. Creates a new folder. Creates a new text file. how to create a folder in cmd, make file hidden, change file attributes, انشاء مجلد, اخفاء ملف

title: Drive Maintenance Commands
content: Drive Maintenance Commands chkdsk defrag Checks a disk for file system errors and bad sectors and attempts to repair them. /f Fixes errors. /r Locates bad sectors. Analyzes and defragments files on local volumes to improve system performance. how to check disk for errors, fix hard drive, defragment, فحص القرص الصلب, اصلاح الباد سيكتور

title: User Management Commands
content: User Management Commands net user lusrmgr.msc Adds, modifies, and removes user accounts. elevated Command Prompt. /add /delete * to change password. Opens the Local Users and Groups GUI. how to add a user in cmd, delete user account, change password command prompt, إضافة مستخدم, حذف مستخدم

title: System Recovery Commands
content: System Recovery Commands sfc bootrec dism rstrui.exe mdsched.exe shutdown /r /o System File Checker. Scans and repairs protected system files. /scannow. repair boot-related issues like MBR or BCD. /fixmbr /fixboot /rebuildbcd. Deployment Image Servicing and Management. /online /cleanup-image /restorehealth. Launches System Restore. Launches Windows Memory DiagNOSstic. Restarts into Advanced Startup. how to repair windows, fix boot problems, system restore from cmd, اصلاح الويندوز, مشاكل الاقلاع

title: System Services & Processes
content: System Services & Processes services.msc taskmgr.exe Opens the Services management console to start, stop, and configure system services. Startup type: Automatic, Manual, Disabled. Opens the Task Manager to view and manage running applications, background processes, and system performance. End task. how to open task manager, stop a service, manage startup programs, إدارة المهام, ايقاف الخدمات
